text: Hagi Midieni sondia vaheki, Ameleki sondia vaheki, zage hanati kazigati sondia vaheki hu'za tusi kenutamimo agofetu agofetu huno mani'negeno hampriga osiakna hu'za ana vahe'mo'za ana agupofina emani avite'naze. Hagi tusi kemori afutami avre'za e'nazankino ana kemoli afutamimo'za hagerinkenafi kasepankna hu'za ana agupoa mani avite'naze.
